code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{setLoggedIn}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=async()=>{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8000/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});if(response.ok){setLoggedIn(true);}else{alert("Login failed");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]});}export default Login;
